name: Flying Stampede!
description:
This game is pretty simple. Imagine jet pack joyride but Narnia edition. Yeah.....             So basically you just fly around killing unicorns that also try to kill you.  BTW you do all this while flying... Thus why you have jet packs, anyway....     Enjoy the  game.

PS: I am in 7th grader in Virginia USA. This is my first game jam and I would appreciate praise alongside some constructive criticism to improve myself. OK, now I'm done.
